Reviews.Title: great package
Reviews.Author: Benoit Devinat
Reviews.Content: Was really looking for an extra battery and SD card to compliment the RX-100 (which has surpassed my expectations by the way)Camera is great,Package is great!

ProductInfo.Features:
KIT INCLUDES 11 PRODUCTS -- All BRAND NEW Items with all Manufacturer-supplied Accessories + Full USA Warranties:
<1> Sony Cyber-Shot DSC-RX100 Digital Camera (Black) + <2> Sony LCS-MD11 Camera Case +
<3> Transcend 64GB SDXC 10 Card + <4> Spare NP-BX1 Battery for Sony + <5> Battery Charger for NP-BX1 +
<6> PD-T14 Flexible Camera Tripod + <7> PD SDHC Memory Card Reader + <8> PD 5pc Complete Cleaning Kit +
<9> PD Memory Card Storage Wallet + <10> LCD Monitor Screen Protectors + <11> Image Recovery Software
ProductInfo.Name: Sony Cyber-Shot DSC-RX100 Digital Camera (Black) with 64GB Card + Battery & Charger + Case + Flex Tripod + Accessory Kit
